name: NSApplication.ActivationOptions
desc: The following flags are for activate(options:).

items.name: activateAllWindows
items.desc: By default, activation brings only the main and key windows forward.  If you specify NSApplicationActivateAllWindows, all of the application's windows are brought forward.

items.name: activateIgnoringOtherApps
items.desc: The application is activated regardless of the currently active app.

items.name: isActive
items.desc: Indicates whether the application is currently frontmost.

items.name: activate
items.desc: Attempts to activate the application using the specified options.

items.name: activationPolicy
items.desc: Indicates the activation policy of the application.

items.name: m NSApplication.ActivationPolicy
items.desc: Activation policies (used by activationPolicy) that control whether and how an app may be activated.
